title: Hamlet (Richardson)
creator_credit: Columbia Pictures Industries and Tony Richardson
brief_description: Nicol Williamson plays Hamlet and Marianne Faithfull, Ophelia, in this version directed by Tony Richardson, filmed in London’s Round House Theatre. The strong close-ups emphasises the impact of the spoken word above all else in this production. The excellent cast includes Anthony Hopkins as Claudius, Judy Parfit as Gertrude and Gordon Jackson as Horatio.
